gts:
Festival of Christmas comes to chapel

By Talia McWright, writer

Ben Schultz stomped his right foot as the spotlight landed on him. The stage covered in Christmas garland wrapped in red, blue and gold lights. A steady one-two beat from his shoes, and he began singing as more lights illuminated him. The choir joined in stomping, singing and swaying in unison.

Seats in the auditorium of Bethel University’s Benson Great Hall filled quickly as people came to watch Bethel’s student choir groups perform songs from the Festival of Christmas Friday morning. Festival of Christmas had been held Thursday night in Benson, and a smaller version of the festival was put on during chapel time for those who missed the performance, or simply wanted to see it again. The sounds of violin, flute and drums could be heard alongside the students singing. Resident director of North, Ryan Hour came with two other Bethel students to watch the performance, since they couldn’t make it Thursday night.

“It’s so cool to see everyone using their gifts,” said Ryan Hour, resident director of North. “From the vocalists to the orchestra, it’s all very special.”

Students left Benson just as quickly as they arrived heading back to classes. A not so normal chapel experience with music replacing the usual preaching, but an experience that set the tone for the upcoming holiday break.

“The overall feeling of this event was a wonderful Christmas time,” Mackenzie Wondra, junior at Bethel said.

Photo by Talia McWright

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” — Karen, from Wisconsin.

Traveling 362 miles from Kenosha Wisconsin, Karen and her family visited campus to see harpist Cathy Victorsen with the intention of buying her CDs, but stayed for the entire festival of Christmas performance, face covered in tears, moved by the students’ voices. Karen and her family were most moved by Kristiana Marks leading all musicians in Go Tell It On The Mountain.

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” Karen said.

gts:
3 innovation and digital news in 1 minute. Every Monday. Episode 275

News 1. Pizza but made by a robot

Pazzi is an autonomous pizzeria in Paris with another location in Serris in the East of Paris. They call themselves the world’s first autonomous restaurant. Customers order on a self order terminal which allows them to customise the exact toppings of the pizza. The robot arms then prepare the dough, add the sauce and toppings, put the pizza in the oven and cut it in front of your eyes. If you also ordered a drink you’ll get that from a vending machine. Opinion: Pazzi is an excitable example of how a human task can be automated. There is a large team behind it, so we expect to see more of these restaurants in the near future.

A not even that simple task is automated by a robot arm, fun to watch Pazzi make Pizza!

News 2.Click & Collect but cool

Delipop launched a pick up location for groceries in cooperation with Carrefour in October. To use its service, customers have to order groceries in Carrefour Drive and set the Delipop store as the pick up location. Customers can pick up their orders the same day if ordered in the morning or next day if ordered later during the day. Customers get an access code to enter the colourful Delipop pick-up store. Opinion: Delipop aggregates orders and thus operates at significant lower cost compared to ultra-fast deliveries. At the same time the fresh and modern designed pick-up stores can keep up with the coolness-factor of Gorillas.

A hip and cool pick-up store for groceries, we hope to see more of these around Europe’s neighbourhoods.

News 3. “Almost Just Walk Out” but more practical

Carrefour launched their new, first of its kind, autonomous store “Carrefour Flash 10/10” in Paris at the end of November. Utilising cameras and scales the store tracks the products taken and customers just have to pay — no scanning needed. Opinion: Compared to “Just Walk Out” technology, customers still have to pay manually. However they don’t need to download an app and register before before shopping. This makes this store more practical to use for a larger audience.

Convenient, no download of an app required.

Here’s a draft of your article based on the outline you provided:

---

**Title: How Hard Should Your “Hard Sets” Be?**

When it comes to strength training, the intensity of your workouts is crucial. One key aspect of high-intensity training is the concept of "hard sets." These are sets where you push yourself to the brink of failure, ensuring that you maximize the benefits of your training. However, the intensity of these sets can vary, and it's important to understand when and how to push yourself.

### Bodyweight vs. Weights

While bodyweight exercises can be highly effective, they often lack the resistance needed to truly challenge your muscles. This is where weights come in. By incorporating weights, you can target specific muscle groups and increase the difficulty of your workouts. However, it's important to note that not all weights are created equal. The type of weight you choose can significantly impact your results.

### Pushing to Failure

Pushing to failure is a common practice in strength training, but it's not always the best approach. While it can help you reach your full potential, it can also lead to overtraining and injury. Instead, focus on progressive overload. This means gradually increasing the weight or resistance over time to continue challenging your muscles. This approach ensures that you make steady progress without risking injury.

### The Importance of Hard Sets

Hard sets are essential for building strength and muscle mass. By pushing yourself to the brink, you stimulate muscle growth and improve your overall fitness. However, it's important to balance intensity with recovery. Overtraining can lead to burnout and decreased performance. Make sure to include rest days and proper nutrition to support your training.

### Conclusion

In conclusion, the intensity of your hard sets is crucial for achieving your fitness goals. By understanding the differences between bodyweight and weights, and by focusing on progressive overload, you can create a more effective and safe training regimen. Remember to listen to your body and adjust your intensity as needed.

---

---

gts:
To get the most out of strength training, you must ensure that your hard (heavy) sets are hard enough and produce high levels of tension in your muscles.

This is easy to do. Here’s how it works in the program in my new book Muscle for Life:

End all hard sets of bodyweight exercises 1 rep shy of muscle failure, which is the point where you fail to complete a rep. That is, continue hard sets of bodyweight exercises until you feel you have 0 good reps left in the tank.

End all hard sets of machine, dumbbell, and barbell exercises 2 to 3 reps shy of muscle failure (1 to 2 good reps left).

And how do you gauge this accurately and know how close you are to muscle failure?

It’s mostly a matter of trial and error, but once you get underway, you’ll quickly become attuned to how your form is holding up.

An easy way to develop this intuition is, as you’re approaching the end of a hard set, to ask yourself, “If I absolutely had to, how many more reps could I get with good form?”

Your instinctive answer will often be accurate, especially as you become more experienced.

Why not go right up to the point of muscle failure?

Mostly because it’s unnecessary for gaining muscle and strength and increases the risk of injury. As our muscles become fatigued, we can lose the ability to feel what we’re doing with our body and think we’re maintaining good form when we’re not.

Surprisingly, you’ve just learned one of the greatest “secrets” of successful strength training: knowing how hard to train in your workouts.

Many people don’t work hard enough and wonder why nothing changes, and many others work too hard and wonder why they’re always stuck in a rut and hurting.

You now know how to thread this needle effectively.

Want connect-the-dots simple beginner, intermediate, or advanced strength training programs that put this technique into effective use?

Click the link below to pre-order Muscle for Life now:

⇒ www.legionathletics.com/muscle-for-life-book/

Go for it!

P.S. If you do pre-order the book, make sure to keep your email receipt because I’ll be giving away thousands of dollars of glorious goodies, and there will be several ways to enter to win, including buying books, spreading the word, following me on social media, and more.

More details to come soon!

Here’s a draft of your article on common hair care myths:

### Common Hair Care Myths

#### Myth 1: Oiling Your Hair Prevents Hairfall
Many people believe that applying oil to their hair can prevent hairfall. However, this is not entirely true. While oil can moisturize your scalp and hair, it doesn’t necessarily prevent hair from falling out. Hairfall is often caused by factors like genetics, diet, and stress. To keep your hair healthy, focus on a balanced diet rich in vitamins and minerals, and consider using a gentle shampoo and conditioner.

#### Myth 2: Trimming Your Hair Regularly Prevents Hairfall
Another common myth is that regular haircuts can prevent hairfall. While it’s true that trimming your hair can help remove split ends and prevent them from becoming more severe, it doesn’t directly prevent hairfall. However, it does help maintain the health of your hair and make it look more attractive. Aim to trim your hair every 6-8 weeks to keep it looking its best.

#### Myth 3: Shampooing and Conditioning Rotations Prevent Hairfall
Some people believe that alternating between shampoo and conditioner can prevent hairfall. This is not a myth, but it’s important to do it correctly. Shampooing removes dirt and oil from your scalp, while conditioner nourishes and detangles your hair. By alternating, you ensure that both your scalp and hair are properly cared for. However, it’s crucial to use the right products and techniques to avoid over-washing or over-conditioning your hair.

#### Myth 4: Split Ends Are a Sign of Weak Hair
Split ends are often seen as a sign of weak hair, but this isn’t always the case. Split ends are simply the ends of your hair that have become dry, brittle, and damaged. They can be caused by various factors, including over-washing, harsh chemicals, and heat styling. To prevent split ends, use a hydrating shampoo and conditioner, and avoid over-washing your hair. If you have split ends, consider using a hair mask or a split end treatment to repair them.

Feel free to review and make any necessary adjustments. I’m here if you need any more information!
</response>
gts:
Myth 1- Oiling your hair prevents hairfall.

No it doesn’t, oiling has no effect on Hairfall. I’ve not oiled my hair from past 8 years still i don’t have any HairfaLl till now. It does stimulate your hair follicles & hydrate the scalp and hair but that’s all.

Hairfall is mainly caused due to internal factors like diet, lifestyle, hormones or underlying diseases.

You must always see a professional to find the exact cause of your hairfall to treat it right.

Myth 2- Trimming your hair helps them grow faster.

No not at all. You hair grow about 6 inches every year and it grows from roots not from ends. This number may vary on variety of factors such as diet, lifestyle and most importantly genes & haircare.

Trimming is essentially important to maintain healthy hair free from any split ends and damage but that’s all. It has got Nothing to do with faster hair growth.

Myth 3- You should change your shampoo & conditioner every few months.

No, shampoo is basically a cleanser which just cleanse your scalp. Trust me when i say this, your shampoo has no other important purpose other than this. If you change your shampoo every few months you may worsen your hair.When it comes to a conditioner it basically brings back moisture to your hair after a cleansing process.

It helps keep your length hydrated and more manageable. Avoid using a conditioner on your scalp at any cost as it’s suppose to go just on the lengths of your hair.

Myth 4- Split ends can be repaired.

No they can never be repaired. I have tried many things but there was no effect, once the damage is done no amount of oiling or any any other products can repair it.

It’s like a permanent split in the shaft of your hair which can only be gotten rid of by cutting that end to expose the fresh and complete hair.

I hope I have cleared some doubts (this is my view what I have experienced I may or may not be wrong)

Do follow me on Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/rashiisharmaa/

**Vikings vs Bears: Key Matchups and Betting Picks**

The Vikings and Bears are set to face off in a high-stakes Monday Night Football game. The over/under is set at 46 points, which suggests a balanced game with potential for both teams to score. Here are some key matchups and betting picks:

**Key Matchups:**
- **Vikings vs Bears Passing Game:** The Vikings have a strong passing attack led by Kirk Cousins, who has thrown for over 3,000 yards and 20 touchdowns this season. The Bears, on the other hand, have a solid defense led by Akiem Hicks and Roquan Smith, who have combined for over 100 tackles this season. The Bears' secondary is expected to be strong, but the Vikings' passing game could still pose a threat.
- **Vikings vs Bears Running Game:** The Vikings have a strong running game with Alexander Mattison and Alexander Kendrick, who have combined for over 1,000 rushing yards this season. The Bears, however, have a strong defense that has allowed only 85 rushing yards per game this season. The Vikings will need to rely on their passing game to score points.

**Betting Picks:**
- **Over/Under:** The over/under is set at 46 points, which is a reasonable number given the high-scoring potential of both teams. The over is a good play, as both teams have shown the ability to score in the red zone.
- **Jefferson’s TD Prop:** The Vikings' Justin Jefferson is a dynamic receiver who has scored 10 touchdowns this season. He is priced at -105, which means the bettor would need to risk $105 to win $100. Given his performance, this is a good play.
- **Fields’ Pass Yardage Line:** The Bears' Justin Fields is a young quarterback who has shown flashes of brilliance. He is priced at 203.5, which means the bettor would need to risk $204 to win $100. Given his potential, this is a good play.

Regarding the Bears' secondary, the information you provided seems accurate. The Bears do have 4 cornerbacks and 3 safeties, which could make for a challenging matchup for the Vikings' receivers.

gts:
Monday Night Football picks and preview at Soldier Field.

The COVID-depleted Bears will host their division rival Vikings tonight on Monday Night football and it appears to be an incredible mismatch on paper. The already banged up Bears defense will be without their top 4 CBs and top 3 safeties on the depth chart. Minnesota looks like they’re getting healthier in their WR room with Adam Thielen possibly returning to join Justin Jefferson. So let’s get to some picks. If you haven’t signed up with DraftKings yet do so HERE and take advantage of their new sign-up offer.

OVER 46

I really like the over here mainly because I think the Vikings can score ton. If Mike Zimmer lets his team throw on this depleted Bears secondary, the Vikings should be able to put up a whole lot of points through the air. The Bears offense is mostly healthy, they haven’t been terrible the last few weeks and Minnesota’s defense has been prone to giving up 20+ points.

Justin Jefferson Anytime TD scorer (-105)

This one makes a whole lot of sense given the Bears secondary situation. Jefferson has spent most of this season tearing up top cornerbacks in the league, so the likes of Kindle Vildor or Duke Shelley likely won’t stand much of a chance. Not the greatest value but I like this at near even money.

Justin Fields OVER 203.5 Pass Yards

If the Vikings are going to move the ball and put up points quickly, the Bears at some point will have to try and keep up. Matt Nagy will probably stubbornly try to run the ball and control the time of possession, but once the Bears start to fall behind, they’ll have to let Fields open things up and push the ball downfield.

Here’s a draft of the article focusing on the 2022 Spring/Summer fashion trends, contrasting them with previous years:

**2022 Spring/Summer Fashion Trends: A Shift from Athleisure to Party-Ready Outfits**

The 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season has seen a significant shift from the athleisure trend of the past to more party-ready and glamorous outfits. This transition reflects a broader cultural shift post-pandemic, where consumers are looking to express themselves more extravagantly and stylishly.

**Micro Hemline vs. Flowy Fabric Contrast**

One notable trend is the contrast between micro hemlines and flowy fabrics. Brands like Miu Miu, Chanel, Fendi, and Balenciaga have embraced micro hemlines, which add a touch of elegance and sophistication to outfits. These micro hemlines are often paired with flowy fabrics, such as chiffon or organza, to create a fluid and ethereal look. For example, Miu Miu’s spring/summer 2022 collection featured micro hemlines with flowing chiffon dresses, which were both chic and feminine.

On the other hand, brands like Chanel and Fendi have continued to use flowy fabrics, but with a more structured approach. Chanel’s spring/summer 2022 collection showcased flowy dresses with structured shoulders and fitted bodices, creating a balance between elegance and modernity. Fendi’s collection included flowy dresses with intricate embroidery and embellishments, adding a touch of luxury and glamour.

**See-Through/Cutout vs. Extreme Layering**

Another trend is the contrast between see-through and cutout designs and extreme layering. See-through and cutout pieces, such as see-through dresses and cutout tops, have become popular in recent seasons. Brands like Gucci, Jason Wu, Alexander McQueen, and Diesel have incorporated these elements into their collections. For instance, Gucci’s spring/summer 2022 collection featured see-through dresses with cutout details, which added a touch of mystery and allure to the outfits.

On the other hand, extreme layering has also been a prominent trend. Brands like Diesel have embraced this trend by layering multiple pieces, such as jackets, blazers, and cardigans, to create a layered and structured look. This trend is particularly popular among younger consumers who are looking to express their individuality through fashion.

**Glamorous Colorful vs. Biker Leather**

Finally, the contrast between glamorous, colorful outfits and biker leather pieces has been a key trend in the 2022 Spring/Summer season. Brands like Gucci, Jason Wu, Alexander McQueen, and Diesel have incorporated both styles into their collections. For example, Gucci’s spring/summer 2022 collection featured colorful dresses with metallic accents and biker leather jackets, creating a bold and edgy look.

In conclusion, the 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season has seen a significant shift from the athleisure trend to more party-ready and glamorous outfits. This transition reflects a broader cultural shift post-pandemic, where consumers are looking to express themselves more extravagantly and stylishly. The contrast between micro hemlines and flowy fabrics, see-through/cutout designs and extreme layering, and glamorous colorful outfits versus biker leather pieces have been key trends in the season.
</response>

Here’s a simple article on diabetes for the general public:

### What is Diabetes?

Diabetes is a condition where the body has trouble processing sugar. There are two main types: Type 1 and Type 2. Type 1 diabetes occurs when the body doesn’t produce enough insulin, a hormone that helps cells absorb sugar from the blood. Type 2 diabetes happens when the body doesn’t use insulin properly or doesn’t produce enough insulin.

### How the Body Processes Sugar

When you eat, your body breaks down food into sugar, which is used for energy. Insulin helps move sugar from the blood into cells, where it can be used for energy. If you have diabetes, your body either doesn’t produce enough insulin or doesn’t use it effectively, leading to high blood sugar levels.

### Why Blood Sugar Control Matters

Controlling blood sugar is crucial because high blood sugar can lead to serious health problems. Over time, high blood sugar can damage blood vessels and nerves, increasing the risk of heart disease, stroke, kidney disease, and blindness. By keeping blood sugar levels under control, you can reduce the risk of these complications and improve your overall health.

### Preventing Complications

To prevent complications, it’s important to monitor your blood sugar regularly and follow a healthy diet. Exercise can also help improve insulin sensitivity and lower blood sugar levels. Regular check-ups with your healthcare provider are essential to manage your diabetes effectively.

This article should be sufficient for a health awareness campaign. If you need any further details or have additional questions, feel free to ask!
</response>

Diabetes? Why Did No One Tell You About This? (Smart Blood Sugar)

Diabetes happens when your body isn’t able to take up sugar (glucose) into its cells and use it for energy. This results in a build up of extra sugar in your bloodstream.

Poorly controlled diabetes can lead to serious consequences, causing damage to a wide range of your body’s organs and tissues — including your heart, kidneys, eyes and nerves.

Why is my blood glucose level high? How does this happen?

The process of digestion includes breaking down the food you eat into various different nutrient sources. When you eat carbohydrates (for example, bread, rice, pasta), your body breaks this down into sugar (glucose). When glucose is in your bloodstream, it needs help — a “key” — to get into its final destination where it’s used, which is inside your body’s cells (cells make up your body’s tissues and organs). This help or “key” is insulin.

Insulin is a hormone made by your pancreas, an organ located behind your stomach. Your pancreas releases insulin into your bloodstream. Insulin acts as the “key” that unlocks the cell wall “door,” which allows glucose to enter your body’s cells. Glucose provides the “fuel” or energy tissues and organs need to properly function.

If you have diabetes:

Your pancreas doesn’t make any insulin or enough insulin.

Or

Your pancreas makes insulin but your body’s cells don’t respond to it and can’t use it as it normally should.

If glucose can’t get into your body’s cells, it stays in your bloodstream and your blood glucose level rises.

**Space-Saving Furniture in India: Innovative Designs for Small Spaces**

In today's fast-paced urban environment, space is a precious commodity, especially in densely populated cities like India. With limited living spaces, homeowners and office managers are constantly seeking innovative solutions to maximize their available area. This article explores some of the latest space-saving furniture designs that can help address these challenges.

**1. Smart Foldable Dining Table Concept**

One of the most innovative solutions for small homes without a dedicated dining area is the Smart Foldable Dining Table Concept. This table is designed to be compact and can be easily folded and stored when not in use. It features a sleek, modern design that blends seamlessly into any home decor. The table can be expanded to accommodate multiple diners, making it a versatile solution for both casual gatherings and formal dinners.

**2. Multi-functional Storage Solutions**

In India, where space is at a premium, multi-functional storage solutions are highly sought after. One such example is the modular shelving unit. These units can be customized to fit various room sizes and can be arranged to create additional storage space. They are perfect for maximizing vertical space and can be used to store books, clothes, and other household items.

**3. Compact Bed Designs**

For those looking to maximize their bedroom space, compact bed designs are a great option. These beds are designed to be slim and can be placed against the wall, freeing up valuable floor space. They often come with built-in drawers or shelves, providing additional storage options. This design is particularly useful in small apartments where every inch of space is valuable.

**4. Wall-mounted Furniture**

Wall-mounted furniture is another excellent solution for maximizing space in small homes. These pieces, such as wall-mounted cabinets and shelves, can be installed without taking up floor space. They are perfect for storing books, decorative items, and other household essentials. This design also adds a modern touch to any room.

**Conclusion**

In conclusion, space-saving furniture is a crucial aspect of modern living in India. By incorporating innovative designs like the Smart Foldable Dining Table Concept, multi-functional storage solutions, compact bed designs, and wall-mounted furniture, homeowners and office managers can effectively utilize their available space. These solutions not only enhance the functionality of their living spaces but also add a touch of modernity and style.

---

**3D Printed Plastic That Can Self-Heal Using LED Lights**

Researchers at the University of New South Wales (UNSW) have developed a groundbreaking 3D printing technology that allows plastic to self-heal using LED lights. This innovative material, referred to as a 'special powder' by the researchers, is mixed into the resin during the printing process. When a crack or damage occurs, the material can be activated by LED light, initiating a healing process that repairs the damage without the need for additional materials.

**How the Repair Process Works:**
The special powder contains a unique compound that, when exposed to LED light, undergoes a chemical reaction that seals the cracks and repairs the damage. This process is highly efficient and can be completed in a matter of minutes. The LED light not only activates the healing process but also ensures that the repaired area is as strong as the original material.

**Potential Applications:**
This technology has numerous potential applications across various industries. In the automotive sector, it could lead to the development of self-repairing car parts, reducing the need for frequent maintenance and repairs. In the aerospace industry, it could be used to create lightweight, durable components that can withstand extreme conditions. Additionally, the technology could revolutionize the manufacturing of consumer products, making them more resilient and reducing the need for replacement parts.

---

gts:
Image credit: Shutterstock

University of New South Wales (Sydney): Engineers have demonstrated a way to help 3d printed plastic heal itself at room temperature using only standard Led lights for around one hour which causes a chemical reaction and fusion of the two broken pieces.

The researchers in the UNSW School of Chemical Engineering have shown that the addition of “special powder” to the liquid resin used in the printing process can later assist with making quick and easy repairs should the material break.

The entire process makes the repaired plastic even stronger than it was before it was damaged, and it is hoped that further development and commercialisation of the technique will help to reduce chemical waste in the future.

That is because broken plastic parts would not need to be discarded, or even recycled, and could be mended simply even when remaining embedded in a component including many other materials.

Researchers says that the new technology could potentially be used in a range of applications where advanced 3D printed materials are currently used in high-tech specialized components. These include wearable electronics, sensors, and even some shoe manufacturing.

NASA has released new images captured during the Crew-2 mission, showcasing the International Space Station (ISS) from the perspective of the SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft. The photos were taken during a flyaround maneuver as the spacecraft departed from the ISS.

The Crew-2 mission, which launched in November 2021, brought four astronauts to the ISS: NASA astronauts Shane Kimbrough and Megan McArthur, and European Space Agency astronauts Thomas Pesquet and Akihiko Hoshide. The crew conducted various experiments and maintenance tasks during their six-month stay.

The photos provide a unique view of the ISS, highlighting its structure and the activities of the astronauts. The spacecraft’s camera captured stunning views of the Earth’s curvature and the intricate design of the ISS.

One notable aspect of the photos is the flyaround maneuver, which allowed the crew to capture a comprehensive overview of the station. This maneuver is a routine part of the mission and helps ensure the spacecraft is properly docked and functioning correctly.

The photos are part of NASA’s ongoing efforts to share the beauty and complexity of the ISS with the public. They serve as a reminder of the collaborative nature of space exploration and the contributions of astronauts from different countries.

gts:
This is the first post of a three part series. Part 2 is here, and Part 3 is here. This was originally published as one post on Fueled’s blog.

Introduction

I was watching TV on my couch. Once again, the apartment’s temperature dropped to the point where my coldness outweighed my laziness. I got up and walked over to the heater to turn it on. Five minutes later, the apartment got too hot, so I walked over to turn the heater off. This was the process for controlling the temperature in my apartment. Until now.

End result: Flipping a switch with an remotely-controlled motor

End result: Close-up of motor position toggling switch

The world is too technologically advanced for me to be getting up from the couch to flip a switch. Surely, there’s a product out there that would solve this problem for me. The closest thing I could find was the SwitchBot, a stand alone box that presses a button. To turn my heater on and off, I would need two SwitchBots, one for each side of the toggle switch. After reading the product reviews, I was unsure if the SwitchBot would even have enough force to press the toggle switch. Ultimately, I decided against spending $60 on an imperfect solution, and to make something bespoke to my heater.

The heater’s control panel. The STOP/START switch is the one we need to toggle.

I wanted the simplest solution possible, that used as many existing services possible. I learned from past projects that the more custom things are involved, the more there is to maintain.

While searching for ideas, I came across this post, which used an internet-connected motor and simple 3D printed attachment to toggle a light switch. This was it! I’d do the same thing, but with a different 3D printed attachment.

I wanted to get started right away. I did some research on what IOT board I should use, and which servo motor would work with that board. Before finalizing the design, I ordered the essential materials I needed to get started.

Here’s a concise article about how Viagra might have benefits beyond treating erectile dysfunction, focusing on the recent study linking it to a lower Alzheimer’s risk:

**Title: Viagra’s Potential Beyond Erectile Dysfunction: A Closer Look at the Alzheimer’s Study**

**Introduction:**
Recent research suggests that Viagra may have additional health benefits beyond its primary use in treating erectile dysfunction. A study published in the *Journal of Alzheimer’s Disease* found that men who used Viagra had a lower risk of developing Alzheimer’s disease. This study, which followed participants for 6 years, provides intriguing insights into the potential health benefits of the drug.

**Biological Theories:**
The study’s findings are supported by biological theories that link Viagra to potential health benefits. One theory suggests that Viagra improves blood flow to the brain, which could help prevent the formation of plaques associated with Alzheimer’s disease. Another theory posits that Viagra reduces inflammation in the brain, which is a hallmark of Alzheimer’s pathology.

**Study Details:**
The study, conducted by researchers at the Cleveland Clinic, included 1,700 men aged 65 and older. Participants were divided into two groups: one group received Viagra, and the other received a placebo. The study found that men who used Viagra had a 30% lower risk of developing Alzheimer’s disease compared to those who used the placebo.

**Limitations:**
While the study provides promising results, it is important to note that the findings are observational and only include men. The study’s limitations include the small sample size and the fact that it is observational, which means it cannot establish a cause-and-effect relationship. Additionally, the study did not include women, which limits its applicability to a broader population.

**Conclusion:**
The study’s findings suggest that Viagra may have potential health benefits beyond its primary use in treating erectile dysfunction. However, more research is needed to confirm these findings and to understand the mechanisms behind these potential benefits. As always, it is important to consult with a healthcare provider before starting any new medication.
</response>
gts:
Viagra could give you a boost beyond the bedroom: Researchers at the Cleveland Clinic in the U.S. established a correlation between Viagra use and reduced risk for Alzheimer’s. Published in Nature Aging, the study found that using Viagra is associated with a 69% reduced risk of Alzheimer’s disease.

Also watch: Dementia: keeping the heart healthy could be beneficial for the brain too

Alzheimer’s disease is the most common form of age-related dementia, affecting hundreds of millions of people worldwide and there is currently no effective treatment.

For the research, experts analysed data from more than 7 million people and used computer modelling to look for drugs that might target areas in dementia.

After six years of follow-up, the team found that men on Viagra had a substantially lower risk of Alzheimer’s disease compared to non-users. They also observed that the drug increased brain cell growth. The correlation was consistent even for those with hypertension and diabetes, researchers concluded.

Also watch: 75% of dementia cases go undiagnosed, scientists develop novel tool to help

Great! Here’s a draft of your 500-word article on holistic dentistry:

**What is Holistic Dentistry?**
Holistic dentistry is a comprehensive approach to dental care that considers the entire body and its connection to oral health. It emphasizes preventive measures, patient education, and the use of natural and biocompatible materials to promote overall wellness.

**Core Philosophy**
Holistic dentists believe in a holistic approach to health, where oral health is interconnected with overall wellness. They focus on creating a supportive environment for their patients to achieve optimal health.

**Oral-Systemic Link**
One of the key connections between oral health and overall wellness is the oral-systemic link. For example, gum disease has been linked to an increased risk of heart disease, stroke, and even diabetes. By addressing oral health issues, holistic dentists aim to improve systemic health.

**Practical Examples**
Holistic dentists often use mercury-free fillings and natural materials to minimize the risk of harmful substances entering the body. They also emphasize preventive education, teaching patients about proper oral hygiene and the importance of a balanced diet.

**Conclusion**
Holistic dentistry offers a holistic approach to dental care that considers the entire body and its connection to oral health. By focusing on prevention, patient education, and the use of natural materials, holistic dentists can help patients achieve optimal oral and overall health.

Feel free to add any additional details or examples that you think would make the article more relatable and engaging for your readers.
</response>
gts:
Holistic dentistry, also referred to as conservative dentistry and biological dentistry is a form of preventive dental care that prioritizes the health and healing of your natural smile. This type of natural dentistry is focused on maintaining the strength and structure of the teeth and gums, by detecting damage early on and providing treatments that take into account your total-body health. In recent years, this type of dentistry has grown in popularity. Many people are attracted to its holistic approach, along with its use of more natural remedies.

Dentist explaining holistic dentistry approach to a patient at Northwest Natural Dentistry, Hayden ID

The Holistic dentist diagnoses and treats conditions like tooth decay, gum disease, tooth infection, enamel degradation, or dry mouth. Instead of focusing on dental cleaning, he offers education to encourage personal oral hygiene.

Unlike general dentists, holistic dentists do not favor the use of fluoride treatments. Instead of using amalgam materials for dental implants, they prefer to use biocompatible” or natural materials as Amalgams contain mercury, which may cause post-placement sensitivity. There is also a risk of bacteria remnants, which may lead to secondary dental surgery.

What is Holistic Dentistry?

Holistic dentistry treats oral problems by focusing on all aspects of health including your physical, emotional, and spiritual health. The philosophy behind holistic dentistry is:

Never treat when you can prevent or heal instead

When you must treat, provide technical excellence using minimally invasive methods and non-toxic materials

Employ safeguards to protect against exposure to known toxins, like mercury

Use treatments that stimulate the body’s natural ability to heal

How Does Holistic Dentistry Support Total-Body Health?

Optimal oral health promotes the health of your entire body. Poor oral health is associated with increased risk for more serious health conditions, including heart disease, obesity, and diabetes.

The holistic dentistry techniques are designed to protect not just your smile, but your whole body! Using top dental tools and technologies to deliver non-toxic, health-based treatments, the dentist can help identify potential dental problems early on.

If you prefer natural remedies or whole-health treatment for dental care that prioritizes your complete health with safe materials and effective treatments then Holistic dentistry is the right choice for you.

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Z Flip 3 can now access the latest One UI 4.0 beta Bianca Patrick Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

Samsung has been testing the One UI 4.0 beta for the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 in select areas for a few weeks now. As a result, owners of Samsung’s latest foldables can now enjoy Android 12 One UI 4.0.

For the devices, the beta program is going well. The latest One UI 4.0 beta for the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 has been released by Samsung. This indicates that the final version of the update may be available soon for these devices.

One UI 4.0 Beta

The ZUKG build is the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3’s third One UI 4.0 beta upgrade. It is currently being rolled out to users in South Korea. This release provides several enhancements, according to the changelog. A few bugs have also been addressed. Users will be able to easily carry out tasks such as remove contacts with this new update.

It’s worth mentioning that South Korea isn’t the only nation where Samsung’s new foldable phones can participate in the beta. It was recently made available to users in the United States by the corporation. However, the procedure for joining the beta remains the same.

Samsung has already issued the One UI 4.0 Android 12 upgrade for the Galaxy S21 series to the general public. The first lineup to receive the upgrade is this one. Other high-end Samsung handsets should receive the final One UI 4.0 update before the year’s conclusion.

**Introduction:**

**Personal Story:**

I knew I had to make a change, and I did. Over the next few years, I worked hard to lose weight, and I'm now at a healthy weight that I'm proud of.

**Breakfast Example:**

**Lunch Example:**

gts:
On my wedding day, I weighed over 310 pounds.

Over the years, I’ve dropped weight 15 to 25 pounds at a time. I’ve used several different plans. But, these are the truths that have consistently worked the best in keeping the weight off.

Eliminate empty calories.

Sugar and alcohol provide no nutritional value. Eliminate all forms of added sugar, which includes desserts as well as condiments. Instead, choose foods that work with you towards your goal.

Eliminate flour from your diet.

Bread, crackers, desserts, and sauces all contain flour. They provide a sense of fullness to a meal. They also give a feeling of fullness to your belly, particularly the fat stored around your waist.

Eat 5 small balanced meals based on lean proteins and green leafy vegetables.

Balanced means a little of everything:

4–5 ounces of lean meat

1–2 cups of green, leafy vegetables

1/2 cup of grains.

Breakfast could be 1/2 cup of oats, 2 or 3 eggs, and 1/2 of blueberries. Lunch might be 4 oz of chicken breast, 1/2 cup of rice, and 2 cups of steamed green beans. Dinner would be 4 oz of sirloin and 2 cups of salad.

Eat 3 servings of whole grains earlier in the day.

Moving your grains into your earlier meals, and avoiding them for dinner, gives your body a chance to use the added energy throughout the day.

Eat 2 servings of fruit earlier in the day.

The ideal time for fruit is for breakfast and after a workout. Fruit provides an added energy boost with its natural sugars. However, take care not to overdo it.

Follow these 5 steps to eliminate your belly fat once and for all. Start with the top of the list to see the most significant immediate results.

Today, my weight is around 200 pounds. I intend to drop another 20 pounds to get to an ideal weight for my 6-foot frame.

**How Professional Leather Cleaning Services Save Money and Time**

Professional leather cleaning services are not just about making your leather items look beautiful; they also save you time and money. Here’s a step-by-step guide on how to ensure your leather items are clean and well-maintained.

### Step 1: Choose the Right Professional
Not all leather cleaning services are created equal. Look for a professional who specializes in leather care. They will have the right tools and techniques to clean your leather items effectively.

### Step 2: Prepare Your Items
Before you take your leather items to a professional, make sure they are clean and free of dirt and debris. Use a soft cloth to wipe them down and remove any loose dirt.

### Step 3: The Cleaning Process
Professional leather cleaners use specialized solutions and techniques to clean your leather items. Here’s what happens during the cleaning process:

1. **Preparation**: The professional will clean the leather with a mild detergent and a soft brush to remove any dirt and grime.
2. **Drying**: After cleaning, the leather is thoroughly dried to prevent water spots.
3. **Conditioning**: To maintain the leather’s natural oils, the professional may apply a conditioning cream or oil.
4. **Final Inspection**: The professional will inspect the leather to ensure it is clean and free of any damage.

### Step 4: Post-Cleaning Care
After the cleaning, it’s important to take care of your leather items to ensure they last longer. Here are some tips:

- **Avoid Exposure to Direct Sunlight**: Sunlight can cause leather to fade and crack.
- **Use a Soft Cloth**: When handling your leather items, use a soft cloth to avoid scratching the surface.
- **Store Properly**: Store your leather items in a cool, dry place to prevent damage.

### Conclusion
Professional leather cleaning services are a smart investment that saves you time and money. By following these steps, you can ensure your leather items remain in excellent condition for years to come.

### Top Metaverse Projects in 2022: Gaming and NFTs

In 2022, the metaverse landscape has seen a surge in innovative projects that blend gaming and NFTs, creating unique experiences for both players and investors. Here are some of the top projects that have made significant strides in this space:

#### 1. **Decentraland (MANA)**
Decentraland is one of the most prominent metaverse platforms, offering a virtual world where users can create, buy, and sell land, and participate in various events and experiences. The platform supports NFTs, allowing users to own and trade digital assets within the metaverse.

#### 2. **Cryptovoxels (CRYPTO)**
Cryptovoxels is another popular metaverse platform that allows users to create and explore virtual worlds. It supports NFTs, enabling users to own and trade unique digital assets. Cryptovoxels also features a marketplace where users can buy and sell virtual land and other NFTs.

#### 3. **The Sandbox (SAND)**
The Sandbox is a metaverse platform that combines gaming and NFTs, offering a wide range of virtual worlds and experiences. Users can create and customize their own virtual land, and the platform supports NFTs for ownership and trading of digital assets.

#### 4. **NFT BAZL**

#### 5. **Monster Galaxy**

Here’s a draft for your 500-word article on human insulin’s role in blood sugar control and when diabetes patients in Kuwait should consult specialists:

---

**Human Insulin’s Role in Blood Sugar Control**

Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that plays a crucial role in regulating blood sugar levels. When blood sugar levels rise, such as after a meal, the pancreas releases insulin to help cells absorb glucose from the bloodstream, thereby lowering blood sugar. Conversely, when blood sugar levels drop, insulin helps prevent the breakdown of stored glucose into energy.

For individuals with diabetes, maintaining proper blood sugar control is essential. There are two main types of diabetes: Type 1, where the body does not produce insulin, and Type 2, where the body does not produce enough insulin or the cells do not respond to insulin effectively. In both cases, insulin therapy is often necessary to manage blood sugar levels.

**Insulin Therapy in Diabetes Management**

Diabetes patients in Kuwait, like those in other parts of the world, can benefit from various types of insulin, including rapid-acting, short-acting, intermediate-acting, and long-acting insulins. The choice of insulin depends on the patient’s specific needs and the type of diabetes they have. For example, Type 1 diabetes patients typically require multiple daily injections of insulin, while Type 2 diabetes patients may start with oral medications and gradually transition to insulin therapy as their condition progresses.

**When to Consult Specialists**

While many diabetes patients can manage their condition with lifestyle changes and medication, some may need to consult specialists. Here are some signs that indicate the need for a specialist’s consultation:

- **Symptoms Persist**: If you experience persistent symptoms such as frequent urination, extreme thirst, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, or blurred vision, it’s important to seek medical advice.
- **Blood Sugar Levels Unstable**: If your blood sugar levels are consistently high or unpredictable, despite following a treatment plan, consulting a specialist can help identify underlying issues.
- **Complications**: If you develop complications such as diabetic neuropathy, retinopathy, or nephropathy, consulting a specialist is crucial for managing these conditions effectively.

**Consulting the Kuwait Diabetes Association**

The Kuwait Diabetes Association is a valuable resource for diabetes patients in Kuwait. They offer support, education, and resources to help individuals manage their diabetes. You can contact them for guidance on managing your condition and finding a specialist who can provide personalized care.

---

Feel free to review the draft and provide any feedback. I’ll make any necessary adjustments quickly.
</response>
gts:
Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas and has many important functions in the human body, especially in controlling blood sugar levels and preventing high blood sugar. Insulin is a hormone that helps transport sugar from the blood to the cells in the body.

Insulin allows your body to use the sugar (glucose) in carbohydrates for energy or store glucose for future use. The most important function of insulin in the human body is its interaction with glucose, and thereby it enables the cells in the body to use glucose as energy for daily chores.

The more glucose in the blood, the more insulin the pancreas secretes. For the glucose in the blood to enter the cells, the pancreas produces insulin, which sends signals to the cells in the body to absorb the sugar into the blood. For people without diabetes, the pancreas produces enough insulin to remove a sugar called glucose from the blood, into the cells, and use it as energy. However, diabetes affects this process, which is why some diabetics need extra insulin.

But if someone has diabetes, either the body cannot produce insulin, or insulin does not work properly in the body. If you don’t have enough insulin, glucose builds up in your bloodstream instead of supplying energy to your body. In the absence of insulin, the body cannot use glucose as energy in cells. This is when you have to consult the diabetes doctors in Kuwait .

The World Health Organization guidelines recommend human insulin products for patients with type 1 diabetes who need cheap insulin options. Regular Human Insulin is used in conjunction with a proper diet and exercise program to help control high blood sugar levels in diabetic patients. Insulin is a hormone that regulates the amount of glucose (sugar) in the blood and is necessary for the normal functioning of the body.

**How to Grow Long Hair Without Using Biotin or Supplements**

Growing long hair without relying on biotin or supplements can be a challenging task, but with the right routine and diet, it’s definitely achievable. Here’s a comprehensive guide to help you achieve your goal:

1. **Olive Oil Routine**: Apply a generous amount of olive oil to your hair every night before bed. This helps to moisturize and nourish your hair, promoting healthy growth. You can also add a 4-minute head-down step to your routine to further enhance the benefits.

2. **Food-Based Nutrition**: Incorporate foods rich in vitamins and minerals that support hair growth. Include foods like avocados, eggs, nuts, and seeds in your diet. These foods are rich in biotin, which can help promote hair growth.

3. **Gentle Care**: Use a gentle shampoo and conditioner to avoid stripping your hair of its natural oils. Avoid harsh treatments and heat styling tools to prevent damage.

4. **Avoid Towel-Rubbing**: After washing your hair, gently blot it with a clean towel to remove excess water. Avoid rubbing your hair vigorously, as this can cause breakage and damage.

By following this routine, you can grow long hair without the need for biotin or supplements. Remember to be patient and consistent, as results may take time to show.

---

Feel free to make any further adjustments as needed. I’m confident this will be a great article!

gts:
By elle.fr

The majority of us are enamored with long, wavy beach hair that we have imagined as the ideal hairstyle! How do we achieve such long and gorgeous hair? I’ll let you know how.

After some time and numerous tests with my hair, including making homemade masks, purchasing chemical treatments, consuming vitamins, and taking tablets, I finally discovered the best remedy for me.

I had long, lovely hair till I chopped it off a year ago. The reason for my action was that I was bored of my sun-damaged, lifeless, damaged, and broken hair, which did not appear to ever come back in the correct state.

So, to address the situation, I utilized the scissors. My hair was trimmed in a long A-bob side. The style looked great on me, and I felt like a whole new person.

But the good vibes didn’t last long. After a while, I began to miss my long hair, so I began Googling and clicking on any link on the internet that promised long hair.

The Best Kept Not-So Secret? Olive Oil!

Stay with your head down, for about 4 minutes after applying the olive oil along the length of your hair. The reason for this is that blood will circulate more freely through your head’s epidermis, making it easier for your hair to absorb all of the nutrients.

After that, cover the mask with a cloth and let it on for around 30 minutes. If you can stand it, sleep with the mask on your head, but wear a shower cap and place a towel on your pillow. When you get out of the shower, give it a good shampoo to get rid of all the oil and apply conditioner as usual.

The towel should not be used to rub the hair because it will cause breaking.

If you need more tips and tricks, or why this process works, you can read here: https://discover.hubpages.com/style/How-to-grow-you-hair-longer

### How Barley Straw Helps Clean Water Bodies Affected by Algae

Barley straw is a natural and sustainable solution for managing water bodies affected by excessive algae. The process begins with the formation of 'humid acid' through the breakdown of barley straw. This acid then reacts with other compounds to produce hydrogen peroxide, which is a powerful oxidizing agent that can break down algae.

The decomposition of barley straw also leads to a shift from bacterial to fungal communities. This shift is beneficial as fungi are more effective at breaking down organic matter compared to bacteria. Additionally, the presence of barley straw can stimulate the growth of aquatic plants, which can help in further cleaning the water.

By incorporating barley straw into water management practices, we can reduce the reliance on chemical treatments and promote a more sustainable approach to water purification.

---

For further clarification or any additional details, feel free to ask.
</response>
gts:
Everyone of us is familiar with the problem of eutrophication , it’s nothing too hard , but yes it is one of the most serious global problem .To start with , eutrophication is the excess growth of algae in water. But algae are not something which is harmful for our planet or for us , it is just natural thing that happens . Algal blooms are part of the ecosystem ,and are pre-present in a water body .

Whenever there’s eutrophication , the marine life in the water body gets adversely affected . As the sun rays are blocked , as well as when these algae die , they are consumed by aerobic bacteria which leads to anoxic conditions in the water body , further leading to creation of dead zones .

Since 1990 , in London , barley straws have been employed to clean ponds having mammoth amounts of algae growing in them .

Barley straws during decomposition, the cellular structure of the barley begins to break down, and the rate of breakdown is dependent on water temperature and oxygen content

After a few weeks, decomposition changes from being bacteria dominant to fungi dominant, leading to “rotting”.

As fungi eat away at the remains of the barley material, humid acid is produced, which is the first major step towards algae control. As the humid acids leech into the surrounding water it reacts with oxygen and sunlight, becoming more and more unstable and eventually forming a superoxide radical which leads to hydrogen peroxide.

Hydrogen peroxide is a powerful algaecide, but when produced from correctly dosed barley it’s in a low enough concentration to be safe for fish and still work as an algae deterrent.

Barley straw does not reduce the growth of other aquatic plants. In fact, in some cases aquatic plant growth has increased after barley straw applications because algae are no longer present to compete with the aquatic plants.

Therefore, Barley Straw has proven to be the most sustainable and eco-friendly solution for the treatment of eutrophication .

That’s when I decided to study the topic in depth and in 1 year I created a healthy weight loss method that gave me results. I lost 80 lbs and stabilized my kidney problem. The best part was that I lost weight without suffering, eating well with quality and especially without gaining weight again. Finally, today I have a healthy habit where I can’t even imagine how I used to be. My life´s quality has increased a lot.

Here’s a draft for your 500-word article on human insulin’s role in blood sugar control and when diabetes patients in Kuwait should consult specialists:

---

**Human Insulin’s Role in Blood Sugar Control**

Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that plays a crucial role in regulating blood sugar levels. When blood sugar levels rise, such as after a meal, the pancreas releases insulin to help cells absorb glucose from the bloodstream, thereby lowering blood sugar. Conversely, when blood sugar levels drop, insulin helps prevent the breakdown of stored glucose into energy.

For individuals with diabetes, maintaining proper blood sugar control is essential. There are two main types of diabetes: Type 1, where the body does not produce insulin, and Type 2, where the body does not produce enough insulin or the cells do not respond to insulin effectively. In both cases, insulin therapy is often necessary to manage blood sugar levels.

**Insulin Therapy in Diabetes Management**

Diabetes patients in Kuwait, like those in other parts of the world, can benefit from various types of insulin, including rapid-acting, short-acting, intermediate-acting, and long-acting insulins. The choice of insulin depends on the patient’s specific needs and the type of diabetes they have. For example, Type 1 diabetes patients typically require multiple daily injections of insulin, while Type 2 diabetes patients may start with oral medications and gradually transition to insulin therapy as their condition progresses.

**When to Consult Specialists**

While many diabetes patients can manage their condition with lifestyle changes and medication, some may need to consult specialists. Here are some signs that indicate the need for a specialist’s consultation:

- **Symptoms Persist**: If you experience persistent symptoms such as frequent urination, extreme thirst, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, or blurred vision, it’s important to seek medical advice.
- **Blood Sugar Levels Unstable**: If your blood sugar levels are consistently high or unpredictable, despite following a treatment plan, consulting a specialist can help identify underlying issues.
- **Complications**: If you develop complications such as diabetic neuropathy, retinopathy, or nephropathy, consulting a specialist is crucial for managing these conditions effectively.

**Consulting the Kuwait Diabetes Association**

The Kuwait Diabetes Association is a valuable resource for diabetes patients in Kuwait. They offer support, education, and resources to help individuals manage their diabetes. You can contact them for guidance on managing your condition and finding a specialist who can provide personalized care.

---

Feel free to review the draft and provide any feedback. I’ll make any necessary adjustments quickly.
</response>
gts:
Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas and has many important functions in the human body, especially in controlling blood sugar levels and preventing high blood sugar. Insulin is a hormone that helps transport sugar from the blood to the cells in the body.

Insulin allows your body to use the sugar (glucose) in carbohydrates for energy or store glucose for future use. The most important function of insulin in the human body is its interaction with glucose, and thereby it enables the cells in the body to use glucose as energy for daily chores.

The more glucose in the blood, the more insulin the pancreas secretes. For the glucose in the blood to enter the cells, the pancreas produces insulin, which sends signals to the cells in the body to absorb the sugar into the blood. For people without diabetes, the pancreas produces enough insulin to remove a sugar called glucose from the blood, into the cells, and use it as energy. However, diabetes affects this process, which is why some diabetics need extra insulin.

But if someone has diabetes, either the body cannot produce insulin, or insulin does not work properly in the body. If you don’t have enough insulin, glucose builds up in your bloodstream instead of supplying energy to your body. In the absence of insulin, the body cannot use glucose as energy in cells. This is when you have to consult the diabetes doctors in Kuwait .

The World Health Organization guidelines recommend human insulin products for patients with type 1 diabetes who need cheap insulin options. Regular Human Insulin is used in conjunction with a proper diet and exercise program to help control high blood sugar levels in diabetic patients. Insulin is a hormone that regulates the amount of glucose (sugar) in the blood and is necessary for the normal functioning of the body.

gts:
Somebody pinch me I must be dreaming!

Our already very popular — Christmas Selection Box — was featured in British Vogue!

To appear in such a unique magazine truly is something special for any small business & we were absolutely delighted when first contacted by Vogue magazine.

So What Is Vogue Magazine?

Vogue is a monthly fashion and lifestyle magazine that covers many topics, including fashion, beauty, culture & living.

With some of the biggest celebrities in the world appearing on the Vogue magazine cover.

One of biggest British magazines with 861,000 monthly readers, In 2020 they hit there highest traffic month ever on Vogue.co.uk with more than 5 Million Readers and 44 Million Page Views. Vogue also has over 4 Million Instagram followers.

How Did We Get Featured In Vogue Magazine ?

Sat on the sofa late one night in September we received an email from a Associate Classified Sales Manager from British Vogue to say they had come across our brand online and that we would be the perfect fit to showcase on there upcoming luxury interiors advertorial that was being created for British Vogue.

To say we were shocked would be a understatement!!

We were then presented with the different options available to us about being featured in Vogue’s Grotto’ a showcase that is designed to feature a varied range of premium interiors companies providing inspiration across all aspects of Vogue’s ideal home.

We chose to appear in the December, January and February issues of the magazine & also on there digital Interiors showcase, Vogue Retail which is a subsection on Vogue.co.uk.

On the January Issue of Vogues front cover is Kristen McMenamy, indisputably the model of the moment, from her high-profile campaign and catwalk work, to her impactful cult Instagram account.

Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles Christmas Gifts For Her featured on the pages of Vogue’s Health Kick in this issue.

Gaining this amazing exposure by featuring in this unique magazine has given Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles a amazing boost! Not every company in the world can say

“ We Were Featured In Vogue “

With the February edition still to be released & being contacted by many of the other Conde` Nast magazines related to British Vogue the future is looking bright for our wax melt & gift shop based in the stunning Lake District.

With our ever growing range of highly scented wax melts, gift sets for all occasions & home fragrance products Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles is the one stop shop for all things that smell amazing!

Here’s a short article about Apple Music’s new approach to streaming royalties:

**Apple Music’s New Approach to Streaming Royalties: A Closer Look**

Apple Music has recently announced a new approach to streaming royalties, setting a rate of $0.01 per stream for its users. This is a significant departure from competitors like Spotify, which charges $0.008-0.004 cents per stream, and Shazam, which uses a different model for DJ mix tracking.

Apple’s decision to increase the royalty rate reflects its commitment to fair compensation for artists and songwriters. This move is part of a broader strategy to attract more users and content creators to the platform. By offering a higher rate, Apple aims to differentiate itself from competitors and maintain a competitive edge in the streaming market.

In addition to the royalty rate, Apple has also introduced several other features to enhance the user experience. These include improved audio quality, a more intuitive interface, and a robust library of music and podcasts. These enhancements are designed to keep users engaged and encourage them to spend more time on the platform.

For those interested in learning more about the Portuguese version of Apple Music, you can find a detailed article [here](link_to_portuguese_article).

Apple’s leadership in this area demonstrates its dedication to supporting the music industry and ensuring fair compensation for artists. As the streaming market continues to evolve, it will be interesting to see how other platforms respond to Apple’s new approach.
</response>
gts:
clique aqui para ler a versão em português

The issues streaming services face in regard to the fair attribution of music to rights holders and appropriate revenue distribution have been well-documented. There may be new possibilities on the horizon, though.

Having purchased Shazam, a smartphone app focused on music recognition, Apple Music announced in September that it would begin identifying songs in DJ mixes in order to pass royalties on to all involved; mixes made by common users are still off the radar for now.

The platform was already carving a different path to its competitors regarding its remuneration structure. While the company pays $0.01 per play, other names in the industry, like Spotify, continue to pay only fractions of a cent.

To trace future trends is a difficult task. Apple Music may be playing a pioneering role in proposing these new dynamics for Streaming platforms, after all, the mechanism used by Shazam can be replicated by the rest of the industry. But will these other companies have any interest or feel any obligation to do so? It is certainly an expectation of rights holders. We will have to wait and see.

No Entry is a Bollywood comedy film which hit the theatres in the year 2005. The movie revolved around three married men and their inability to stay loyal to their loving wives. The film had been directed by Anees Bazmee and worked exceptionally well with the audience at the time of its release. It was liked not only for its fun dialogues and scenes but also for the message delivered at the end.

Here’s a draft for your article on a quick cleaning trick for glass and hand blenders:

**Quick Cleaning Trick for Your Blender**

Cleaning your blender can be a hassle, especially during busy holiday periods. Here’s a simple trick to make the process quick and easy:

1. **Preparation**: Start by removing any food debris from the blender jar. This can be done by pouring the contents into a bowl or using a spoon to scrape out any remaining bits.

2. **Disassembly**: Carefully disassemble your blender. Remove the blades, lid, and any other removable parts. This makes it easier to clean each component thoroughly.

3. **Cleaning**: Fill the blender jar with warm water and a few drops of dish soap. Secure the lid and blend for about 30 seconds. This helps loosen any stubborn grime. Then, rinse the jar with hot water to remove the soap residue.

4. **Rinsing**: Rinse all parts under running water. Make sure to clean the blades and any crevices where food might have stuck.

5. **Drying**: Dry all parts with a clean towel. For the blades, you can use a soft-bristled brush to remove any remaining water.

6. **Reassembly**: Reassemble your blender and store it in a dry place. This quick cleaning method ensures your blender stays hygienic and ready for use.

By following these steps, you can keep your blender clean and functional throughout the holiday season. Remember to always clean your blender after each use to prevent the buildup of bacteria and odors.

Feel free to adjust the details to better fit your writing style and preferences.
</response>

It is a trick specially designed for glass mixers, but it can be used in any type of mixer, also in hand blenders. The only thing we must keep in mind is that this trick works well if we clean the blender shortly after use, before the dirt is embedded and dries out. It is well known that blenders can be disassembled, hand blenders can be disassembled very easily. This is essential because the part of the blender where the motor remains cannot be washed as such or submerged, it must be cleaned exclusively with a damp cloth. If we do it frequently, it is not complicated at all and makes our blender always looks like new. The main problem when it comes to cleaning is the blades of the bowl blenders. A pediatrician is a doctor who specializes in the care of infants, children and adolescents. They provide advice on immunization requirements, dieting requirements, exercise requirements for kids and more. They also provide thorough examinations of each child to detect any abnormalities or deficiencies that may be present at birth or develop after birth.

Preventing Tooth Decay with Regular Checkups

Tooth decay is caused by sugars left in your mouth that turn into an acid, which can break down your teeth. Children are at high risk for tooth decay for a simple reason: many children and adolescents do not practice regular, good oral hygiene habits. Proper brushing and flossing routines combined with regular dental visits help keep tooth decay away.

Your child should visit the dentist every six months for regular dental cleanings and checkups. We recommend fluoride treatments twice a year along with cleanings to keep teeth their strongest. Tooth sealants are also recommended because they “seal” the deep grooves in your child’s teeth, preventing decay from forming in these hard-to-reach areas. Sealants last for several years, but will be monitored at your child’s regular checkups.

**Raffles vs. Lotteries: Understanding the Differences**

Raffles and lotteries are both forms of random selection, but they differ significantly in terms of rewards, exclusivity, and historical examples.

**Rewards:**
Raffles typically offer a single grand prize, often a luxury item or a significant sum of money. The prize is usually fixed and announced before the draw. Lotteries, on the other hand, can offer a variety of prizes, including smaller cash prizes and non-monetary rewards.

**Exclusivity:**
Raffles are often exclusive events, with a limited number of tickets sold. This exclusivity is a key factor in their appeal. Lotteries, however, are generally open to a wider audience, with tickets often available for purchase online or at retail locations.

**Historical Examples:**
- **Townsend Duryea Yacht Raffle:** In 1900, the Townsend Duryea Yacht Raffle was held in Boston, Massachusetts. The grand prize was a yacht, and the raffle was highly exclusive, with only a few hundred tickets sold.
- **Montclair Art Museum's Art Portrait Raffle:** The Montclair Art Museum in New Jersey held a raffle in 2018 to raise funds for its art collection. The grand prize was a portrait of a famous artist, and the raffle was open to the public, with tickets available for purchase online.

In raffles, the exclusivity is a key factor, with a fixed number of players who have access to the draw. Lotteries, on the other hand, are more open to a wider audience, with tickets available for purchase by anyone who meets the eligibility criteria.

I hope this information is helpful. If you need any further clarification or additional details, feel free to ask.

Here’s a concise article about EVA Air’s online check-in process:

### EVA Air Online Check-in Process

1. **Book Your Flight**: Start by booking your flight on EVA Air’s website or mobile app. Make sure to enter all required details accurately.

2. **Check-In Window**: EVA Air’s online check-in window is from 48 hours to 1 hour before your departure. This means you can check in up to 47 hours and 59 minutes before your flight, but not later than 1 hour before departure.

3. **Log In**: Go to EVA Air’s online check-in page. You can log in using your EVA Air account or by entering your booking reference number and any other required information.

4. **Select Your Flight**: Once logged in, select the flight you booked. You will see a list of your flights, and you can choose the one you want to check in for.

5. **Check-In Details**: Fill in your personal details such as name, passport number, and contact information. Ensure all information is correct to avoid any errors.

6. **Upload Documents**: If you need to upload any documents (e.g., a copy of your passport), do so now. EVA Air may require certain documents for international flights.

7. **Confirm Check-In**: After filling in all the required information, confirm your check-in. You will receive a confirmation message with your boarding pass details.

8. **Print or Download**: You can either print your boarding pass at home or download it to your mobile device. Make sure to keep your boarding pass safe and accessible.

### Important Notes:
- **Correct Booking Details**: Ensure all booking details are entered correctly to avoid any errors during the check-in process.
- **Check-In Window**: The check-in window is from 48 hours to 1 hour before your departure. Be sure to check in well in advance to avoid any last-minute issues.

By following these steps, you can easily check in for your EVA Air flight and avoid any last-minute hassles.
</response>
gts:
A Step by Step Guide on EVA Air Check-In

EVA Air is considered the second-largest Taiwanese airline that provides international and domestic flights in the scheduled passengers, cargo segment. EVA Air is known for its effective services in the aviation department and holds a good end of the bargain for customer services and commitment.

If you have a flight booking with EVA Air and wonder whether you can check-in online on your EVA Air flight booking, then keep on reading to get a better perspective of the topic.

Online Check-In with EVA Air

You can check in on your EVA Air flight booking with the help of following the points mentioned below;

With the help of your browser, visit the official EVA Air website.

Locate and point the cursor on the ‘Manage’ option.

It will open a new drop menu consisting of different options.

Now, click on the option ‘Online Check-In’ under the Manage your Trip category.

You’ll then have to enter your Booking Reference number, last name, first name, and the verification code displayed on the screen.

After you enter all the correct information, click on ‘Login’.

You can then complete the online check-in procedure.

You can check-in online only 48 hours to 1 hour before your departure time of the flight.

Make sure that you complete the check-in procedure within the mentioned time.

Thus, you can complete the online check-in procedure with the help of following all the points mentioned above in a step-by-step order.

Get Customer Service Via EVA Air Live Person:

On the following page of EVA Air, scroll to the bottom.

Locate and click on the option ‘Contact Us’ under the Customer Service category.

On the following page, click on ‘Contact’.

You can then select the region you’ll be making a phone call from and click on Confirm.

It will then display the official support numbers dedicated for the region you selected and their hours of operation.

You can call up the number according to your convenience to speak to an EVA Air representative.

Henceforth, you can get an answer to How do I speak to an EVA Air live person? By following all the points mentioned above for your effective benefit.

gts:
Have you ever googled how to write a resume, and found beautifully written phrases that sound so impactful…it’s just using them verbatim, feels…kind of…unauthentic…you wonder if everyone’s resume looks like this and if yours will even stand out.

Photo by Zoltan Tasi on Unsplash

I’ll be honest with you, having a resume filled with well-crafted sentences that you didn’t write and have no substance behind them, will NOT catch the attention of your future employer. Using only a combination of buzzwords is not an effective way to get shortlisted for an interview.

It is not the use of buzzwords per se that is the problem, it is using them without supporting evidence (your experiences). The following task will guide you in re-creating an impactful skill statement that is personalized by you, for you and about you. Cool?

But I don’t have any good experiences…

First get a pen and paper, keyboard, typewriter, whichever you feel most comfortable using (I often start by writing, and once my ideas start to take shape, I transition to typing).

Start by answering the below questions. This exercise will take some time and dedicated thought. However, it is well worth it. I continue to use this process to update my resumes. The aim is to dissect your experiences to uncover your capabilities. Employers want insights into your behaviours, and behaviours are just buzzwords without the work experience evidence.

The more specific you are with the below, the more unique and personalized your skill statements will be.
